label: logicC:transport_en
steps: [1] If an accident blocks Highway 7, then traffic is diverted off Highway 7.
[2] If traffic is diverted off Highway 7, then vehicles take the signed detour.
[3] If vehicles take the signed detour and the detour is open, then vehicles reach their destination.
[6] For every vehicle x, if x is scheduled for maintenance, then x requires an inspection.
[7] Bus A12 is scheduled for maintenance.
[8] For every vehicle x, if x requires an inspection, then x either passes inspection or is taken out of service.
[9] Traffic is diverted off Highway 7. (from [1] and [5])
[10] Vehicles take the signed detour. (from [2] and [9])
[11] Vehicles reach their destination. (from [3] and [10] and [4])
[12] Bus A12 requires an inspection, and it either passes inspection or is taken out of service. (from [6],[7],[8])
